SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Happy_01>I underestimated you.<sp:0:4:0>While my brothers run their mouths,
you let your weapon do the talking—
and how loquacious it is!
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>*sigh* Ridiculous. Those two are still bickering,
even at this late hour?

I don't care if it's that <clr:0000>rumored beast <clr:ffff>or the
<clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff>. Can we just pick one and get
going? <sp:5:1:0>Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I won't forget your heroism for as long as
I live...<sp:5:0:0> Is that too strong? <sp:5:0:0> Well, I won't
forget it for a really long time.
Rather than just thanking you, I'll show
my appreciation more tangibly.<sp:0:4:0>Here you are.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I know monsters won't step foot on the
stable grounds, but...

There are still some scary monsters and
such prowling around at night. So I'd
prefer to be sleeping inside.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But of course, I can't because my older
brothers... <sp:5:1:0>They'll keep on bickering, even
while they're asleep!
Good grief. <clr:0000>Rumored beast <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>legendary
weapon<clr:ffff>, I don't care. Can't they just
pick one?

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I know logically that it's safe under
this roof. But long ago, my metal sword
was struck by lightning and, well...
Let's just say I get nervous when it rains.

older brothers are still in there bickering
about where to go next.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>So ridiculous. I for one don't care if
we look for that <clr:0000>rumored beast <clr:ffff>or the
<clr:0000>legendary weapon<clr:ffff>.
Can't they just hurry up and pick
one already?

Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Do you need something? If so, you'd be
better off asking a <clr:0000>stable worker <clr:ffff>for help.
I'm just a visitor.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>My older brothers have been arguing
incessantly about where to go next.
It's exhausting.
I got so tired of listening to them that
I had to seek refuge out here.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I don't put much faith in either legends or
rumors. <sp:5:0:0>But more than that...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I find the <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>fallen ruins<clr:ffff> caused by

interesting area of study.
